testCase.name: DynamicTimer.vue loads default Generic timer UI on mount
DynamicTimer.vue loads Pomodoro timer UI upon switching to Pomodoro mode
DynamicTimer.vue displays time (in seconds) with the HH:MM:SS format
DynamicTimer.vue automatically stops after the timer is depleted
DynamicTimer.vue does not allow time to increase beyond 24 hours (86,400 seconds)
DynamicTimer.vue does not allow time to decrease below 0 seconds
DynamicTimer.vue will not play when time is set or changed to 0
DynamicTimer.vue resets General timer to 0 upon switching to Pomodoro and back
DynamicTimer.vue resets Pomodoro timer to 25:00 upon switching to General and back
DynamicTimer.vue resets time to default and halts all operations upon clicking the reset button
